name: Of Mist And Shadows
description:
- WHAT IS IT ?

It's a  roguelike made for 2020 #7DRL Challenge

- WHAT'S THE PLOT ?

You play as SNARRY, a magic school student who accepted a bet while he was drunk and now he must to get the eye of THE ANCIENT CHAOS in his dimension, a land  full of MIST and SHADOWS !

- WHAT CAN I DO ?

You can use your MAGIC just typing the right spells on your keyboard in order to defeat the monsters ! 

COMMANDS AND MORE ARE INSIDE THE GAME!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
